title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A novel about the American dream and the tragic story of Jay Gatsby.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A powerful tale of racial injustice in the American South.

author: George Orwell
description: A chilling vision of a totalitarian future society.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A witty exploration of the social classes and relationships of the time.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A story about the struggles of adolescence and alienation.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: The adventurous tale of Bilbo Baggins and his quest to the Lonely Mountain.

title: Moby-Dick
author: Herman Melville
description: The epic tale of Captain Ahab's quest for revenge against the white whale.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The magical story of Harry Potter's first year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A journey of self-discovery and following one's dreams.

title: The Road
author: Cormac McCarthy
description: A harrowing tale of survival and hope in a desolate world.
